other_tests.findings: Sinus bradycardia, with a rate of 41 beats per minute.
Areas of decreased attenuation in the occipital, posterior temporal, and parietal lobes.
Bilateral cortical and subcortical areas of hyperintensity in the occipital, posterior temporal, and parietal lobes on T2-weighted images.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Resolution of the abnormalities noted on the previous MRI.

other_tests.findings: Glucose level of 98 mg/dl, protein level of 40 mg/dl, with 1 white cell per high-power field. No cells or organisms were seen on Gram's staining.
Changes suggestive of an acute generalized, predominantly motor neuropathy.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Worsening sensorimotor polyneuropathy was noted on the 11th day.

other_tests.findings: Glucose level of 117 mg/dl and a protein level of 53 mg/dl; negative for varicella–zoster virus and Epstein–Barr virus.
